Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed  at Logan Square
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Logan Square due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Logan Square due to a sick customer.
Consider #56 Milwaukee and #76 Diversey buses as alternative.
Personnel are working to restore service.  Allow extra travel time.
